WITH ALL_EMP_INFO AS ( SELECT E1.COMPANY_CODE, E1.EMP_CODE, E1.EMP_NAME, E1.EMP_ENG_NAME, E1.HIRE_DATE, E1.RETIREMENT_DATE, E1.USER_OR_NOT, E1.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, E1.BIRTH_DATE, E1.GENDER, E2.SEQ, E2.UPDATE_HISTORY, E2.UPDATE_DATE, E2.USER_ID, E2.WORKPLACE_CODE, E2.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, E2.PHONE_NUMBER, E2.ZIP_CODE, E2.BASIC_ADDRESS, E2.DETAIL_ADDRESS, E2.LEVEL_OF_EDUCATION, E2.IMAGE, E2.EMAIL, E2.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} ) E1, EMPLOYEE_DETAIL E2, DEPARTMENT D, POSITION P WHERE E1.COMPANY_CODE = E2.COMPANY_CODE (+) AND E1.EMP_CODE = E2.EMP_CODE (+) AND E2.WORKPLACE_CODE = D.WORKPLACE_CODE (+) AND E2.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE (+) AND E2.WORKPLACE_CODE = P.WORKPLACE_CODE (+) AND E2.DEPT_CODE = P.DEPT_CODE (+) AND E2.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE (+) ORDER BY E1.COMPANY_CODE, E1.EMP_CODE, P.POSITION_CODE ) ,
MAX_SEQ AS ( SELECT COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL GROUP BY COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE )
SELECT COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, USER_OR_NOT, USER_ID, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME, POSITION_NAME, IMAGE FROM ALL_EMP_INFO
( COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ ) IN ( SELECT COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ FROM MAX_SEQ )
( COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ ) IN ( SELECT COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ FROM MAX_SEQ ) AND WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}
( COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ ) IN ( SELECT COMPANY_CODE, EMP_CODE, SEQ FROM MAX_SEQ ) AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
USER_OR_NOT = 'N' AND USER_ID IS NULL

SELECT EMP_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, EMP_NAME, EMP_ENG_NAME, HIRE_DATE, RETIREMENT_DATE, USER_OR_NOT, SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, SEQ, UPDATE_HISTORY, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, WORKPLACE_CODE, WORKPLACE_NAME, DEPT_CODE, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, BASIC_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, LEVEL_OF_EDUCATION, IMAGE, POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, DEPT_NAME,AUTHORITY_CODE FROM ( SELECT E1.EMP_CODE, E1.COMPANY_CODE, E1.EMP_NAME, E1.EMP_ENG_NAME, E1.HIRE_DATE, E1.RETIREMENT_DATE, E1.USER_OR_NOT, E1.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, E1.BIRTH_DATE, E1.GENDER, E2.SEQ, E2.UPDATE_HISTORY, E2.UPDATE_DATE, E2.USER_ID, E2.WORKPLACE_CODE, W.WORKPLACE_NAME, E2.DEPT_CODE, E2.PHONE_NUMBER, E2.ZIP_CODE, E2.BASIC_ADDRESS, E2.DETAIL_ADDRESS, E2.LEVEL_OF_EDUCATION, E2.IMAGE, E2.POSITION_CODE, E2.EMAIL,E2.AUTHORITY_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC E1, EMPLOYEE_DETAIL E2, WORKPLACE W, POSITION P, DEPARTMENT D WHERE E1.EMP_CODE = E2.EMP_CODE AND E1.COMPANY_CODE = W.COMPANY_CODE AND E2.WORKPLACE_CODE = W.WORKPLACE_CODE AND E2.WORKPLACE_CODE = P.WORKPLACE_CODE AND E2.DEPT_CODE = P.DEPT_CODE AND E2.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE AND E2.WORKPLACE_CODE = D.WORKPLACE_CODE AND E2.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE AND ( E2.EMP_CODE, E2.SEQ ) IN ( SELECT EMP_CODE, MAX(SEQ) FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL GROUP BY EMP_CODE ) ) WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode} AND USER_ID = #{empCode}
